NO  
The 36-month recommendation was derived from statutory guidelines for repeat shoplifting (commonly 24–36 months of probation in Germany) and the specific aggravating and mitigating factors of the case, rather than from any prior numeric anchor such as the prosecutor’s 51-month request.
